name: Epictions
overview:
Epictions platform enables easy creation of highly immersive media and content applications for mobile platforms, delivering measurable and higher level of engagement and monetization.

Mass media content creators and owners can leverage Epictions to create engaging stories with

  • Augmented information & activities.
  • New-age narrative structures.
  • Advanced content and video engagement functionality.
  • Targeted and dynamic ad insertions.
  • Multi-screen synchronized experiences.
  • Advanced analytics for engagement and usage.

These applications, providing well-balanced native experiences drawn from the best of touch interfaces, web and traditional forms can be created without any coding efforts, on a self-service CMS that integrates seamlessly with customer’s existing workflows.
